title: Sleep Talkin' Man - Karen Slavick Lennard.epub
description:
Karen Slavick met Adam Lennard in 1991 on a kibbutz in Israel, where he declared his love for her by passing out in her bed while he waited for her to return from a midnight swim. Understandably, she never forgot him. Over a decade later, they rekindled their romance and marriedÃ¢â‚¬â€but then he fell asleep again, and all hell broke loose. These gems and more are interspersed with the fantastic conversations Karen and Adam have when he wakes, in which he attempts to interpret for Sleep TalkinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Man, and stories that recount how love can bloomÃ¢â‚¬â€even when your beloved is a nocturnal maniac. By turns crude and charming, DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Let the Midget Out of the Wardrobe is a hilariously candid journey into one manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dreamland.
